title: Driving Miss Daisy
creator_credit: Elizabeth McBride, Bruno Rubeo, John P. Mesa, Alfred Uhry, Lili Fini Zanuck, Bruce Beresford, Robert Doudell, Richard D. Zanuck, Warner Bros. Pictures, Majestic Films International and The Zanuck Company
brief_description: The story of an old Jewish widow named Daisy Werthan and her relationship with her black chauffeur, Hoke. From an initial mere work relationship grew in 25 years a strong friendship between the two very different characters in a time when those types of relationships where shunned.

constellations_other.name: Fred Schepisi
constellations_other.description: Fred Schepisi's diverse body of work connects to acclaimed local productions, westerns and Hollywood favourites.
